resources.string:
As TV advertisers are shifting budgets online, video advertising will only grow. But advertisers are confronted with a growing lack of visible, measurable, engaging and brand safe quality video inventory. Available on trusted and transparent publisher websites only. Dedicated to help overcome this situation, VMG offers publishers, broadcasters, ad networks and advertisers highly innovative, reliable video advertisement formats. Plus a comprehensive high end monetization platform. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec sodales sapien in ligula aliquet consectetur. VIDEO STACK AND DASHBOARD
We offer a modular video platform created for publishers, broadcasters and ad networks. Enabling to manage both your supply and demand through an intuitive designed user interface. Or connected to your own ad server and reporting tools by API.
The VMG unified ad server and open RTB based SSP are connected with all major video demand platforms. It allows for setting up and managing VAST and VPAID tag-based and full programmatic video campaigning. Also allowing publishers and networks to create their own PMP’s.
Monetization and campaign engagement and performance data generated come real time due to the AWS back-end infrastructure. All in one modular platform.
INPAGEVIDEO
The most powerful and successful native outstream video format available worldwide to really engage with your audiences.
Global acceptance by publishers and advertisers alike, due to the elegant and natural way InPageVideo commercials unfold and position themselves within the heart of article content. InPageVideo is both user friendly and highly impactful. Impactful because the video ad plays in a large format in the heart of publisher’s website content. User friendly because the viewer can always choose to watch the video or not by scrolling or clicking away. Sound is by default user initiated (by mouse over or tap). InPageVideo campaigns invariably show good VTR and CTR performance across all screens.
Available on desktop, mobile web and in-app, all common devices and in various formats like horizontal, vertical and rectangular.
